settings.title:
Save Stress,
Save Money!
settings.content: Fully customizable options suited just for you.

settings.title: Get Amazing Coffee Shipped Right to Your Door!
settings.text: Never run out of coffee again! Every coffee is roasted fresh to order and shipped the same day, so you can rest assured that your cup will always be overflowing with great coffee! Plus, every subscription is easily manageable through our subscription portal, so you can customize it to your specific (and ever-changing) coffee needs!
